channel.title: Making a web browser?
channel.description: I was wondering is it possible to make a website browser that isnt based on internet explorers engine? if so how? or what language

item.title: Making a web browser?
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

if you want to create a browser from scratch, learn to parse the html, create a DOM tree representation and render it according to specifications. you could use any language to write this, but it’s not an easy task to get it rendering things even remotely correctly and simply by the nature of the questions you’ve asked i don’t think you’d be able to do it, or that it’s even appropriate.

if this is to solve a direct problem with internet explorer controls in visual basic/c# then there are ways to implement alternatives like webkit.

Read full topic
